personalInfo.name: Arvindh
personalInfo.title: Full Stack Developer
personalInfo.bio: I am a passionate full-stack developer with a strong background in building modern, scalable web applications. Lets collaborate and bring your ideas to life.

projects.title: Online Rendel App
projects.description: An online rental app for browsing listings, booking items, managing rentals, and handling payments, with admin control and real-time updates for a seamless user experience.

projects.title: Crop and Fertilizer Recommendation
projects.description: This project aims to analyze and explore a dataset for crop recommendations using Python. The code performs basic exploratory data analysis (EDA) to understand the dataset structure, detect potential issues, and visualize insights.

projects.title: Ride Ranger
projects.description: A ride-sharing app enabling users to book rides, track drivers in real-time, and manage trip history. Includes driver onboarding, fare calculation, and secure payment integration.

keyResponsibilities: Developed front-end applications using Svelte and Node.js.
Integrated third-party services and APIs to enhance application functionality.
Helped Senior developers and conducted code reviews.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
education.description: Completed a comprehensive curriculum in computer science, including courses in data structures, algorithms, software engineering, and artificial intelligence. Worked on several projects, including a web application for managing student organizations and a mobile app for tracking fitness activities.

testimonials.name: Jeeva
testimonials.title: Test Engineer
testimonials.feedback: Arvindh is a fantastic developer who consistently delivers high-quality work. His ability to solve complex problems is impressive.

testimonials.name: Krishna
testimonials.title: Software Developer
testimonials.feedback: Arvindh is a highly skilled developer who brings a lot of value to our projects. His expertise in full stack development is top-notch.
